> These are the lectures for the ENVS 543 Environmental Data Literacy course I am teaching this semester.  Individual lecture components will be added as the term progresses and be reset with the lecture content for the Spring 2023 semester in Jaunary.

## Lectures for Environmental Data Literacy

The class consists of the following main sections.

### Logistics

- ENVS 543 Welcome & Logistics
- Git & Github
- Markdown 
- Data Types 
- Data Containers
- Tidyverse


### Univariate Data on One Variable

- Graphics that DON'T suck  
- Confidence on a Mean
- Biniomial Inferences ]


### Inferences on More than One Variable

- Categorical ~ f(Categorical)  
- Continuous ~ f(Categorical)  
- Continuous ~ f(Continuous)  
- Categorical ~ f(Continuous)  


### Spatial Data

- Points, Lines, & Polygons  
- Raster Data   
- Cartography  
- Census Data  
- Raytracing
